name: FPS Zombies
description:
This is my First Beta Release on Android.

This Game is Made using Unity Store free Assets, 3D Models from different Sites like Sketchfab and YouTube Tutorials like Brackeys.

This Game is not Complete yet just a Small part with 3 Levels and Some Bugs like Restart Button is not working.

Please Play this Game and Send me your Feedback so that I can Remove the bugs and Glitches.

It took me around 4 Months of Hard Work so please don't HATE it.

Play and Enjoy and Donate if Possible.

With Regards

AA Ansari

AAA GAME STUDIO

Contact Email : aaansari18mzp@gmail.com
